Agency: Health & Human Services Department Office for Civil Rights

Company: Boston Medical Center and East Boston Neighborhood Health Center
Description: Boston Medical Center and its East Boston community health center agreed to pay $600,000 in settlement of allegations they submitted inappropriate charges to the Massachusetts Uncompensated Care Pool.

Company: Boston Medical Center Corp. and Boston Medical Center Health Plan, Inc.
Description: Boston Medical Center Corp. and Boston Medical Center Health Plan agreed to pay $562,000 in settlement of allegations engaged in deceptive marketing stating it was necessary for people to switch to the Boston Medical Center Health Plan to continue getting care at Boston Medical Center, and that it used the protected health information of patients in order to target the marketing.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
